messages.title: YOUR FUTURE, YOUR CHOICE
messages.content:
In Scotland our health service is the best in the UK. We are building council houses again. Our children get free meals at school. We treat older people with dignity and offer them care and support without charge. Young people can go to university without running up huge debt. But we need and want to do more.

All this is despite the Conservatives at Westminster. They still control the money and they take it in taxes from Scotland’s oil resources. They have cut one pound in every ten that is spent on vital public services. This election is about what direction Britain should take.
